img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 32.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/64/Wukong_MiddleHollow_32.jpg)
If you're having trouble taking on this supercharged enemy, a good thing to remember is that if it scrambles a bit to side to twirl about, it will either spew poison in a frontal arc, or go for a quick a pincer attack. Defeating this foe will earn you the Puppet Spider Spirit, and you can return back to the path outside.
img_below_text:
Watch out for some Wasp Guai hiding in the cocoons (which won't be as bad if you dealt with the archer above). As the path opens up, you can spot the other Shrine across the chasm, with this path leading up the left side.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/13/Wukong_MiddleHollow_34.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 32 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MiddleHollow 32.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/64/Wukong_MiddleHollow_32.jpg)
If you're having trouble taking on this supercharged enemy, a good thing to remember is that if it scrambles a bit to side to twirl about, it will either spew poison in a frontal arc, or go for a quick a pincer attack. Defeating this foe will earn you the Puppet Spider Spirit, and you can return back to the path outside."
            - Following Text: "Watch out for some Wasp Guai hiding in the cocoons (which won't be as bad if you dealt with the archer above). As the path opens up, you can spot the other Shrine across the chasm, with this path leading up the left side.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/13/Wukong_MiddleHollow_34.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a tense moment in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is engaged in combat with a formidable enemy, a supercharged insect-like creature. The preceding text provides tips on how to handle this enemy, noting its attack patterns and the reward for defeating it, the Puppet Spider Spirit. The following text warns players to be cautious of hidden Wasp Guai in cocoons as they progress further. The image serves to illustrate the challenging encounter and the environment players will navigate in this section of the game.
